fixed_skill.desc: Deal Wind damage to all foes equal to 53.1/55.8/58.4% of Attack. 29.5/31.0/32.4% chance to inflict Windswept for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Magaru

innate_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 108.3/113.7/119.1%  of Attack. Increase critical rate by 20%, and decrease accuracy by 20%.
innate_skill.name: Lucky Punch

innate_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 9.1% when it rains.
innate_skill.name: Ambient Aid I

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 5.8%. Decrease SP cost of Wind skills by 22%.
passive_skill.name: Wind Bloodline

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 5.8%. Decrease SP cost of Wind skills by 26%.
passive_skill.name: Wind Bloodline I

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Wind damage to all foes equal to 180.0%/192.6%/205.2% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
